title: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s new mobile phone

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone: A mobile phone is a wireless communication tool between two people, and it was invented for that, and it cannot be ignored in this day and age. Interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone: Interpretation scholars say that seeing a person in a dream buying a new mobile phone indicates an imminent marriage, And that a formal engagement embodies a good person. If the dreamer sees her buying a new phone in a dream, this symbolizes a lot of kindness and great power that he will soon obtain. But when a person goes through difficulties and problems in his life and sees in his dream that he is buying a mobile phone, it promises him that he will overcome Over all the obstacles he faces in those days. Also, dreaming of buying a new cell phone symbolizes a stable and calmer life, far from conflicts. If the dreamer sees in a dream buying the new expensive mobile phone at the right time, this will lead to a life of luxury that he lives and an improvement in his situation Financial. In general, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is buying a new mobile phone, this promises him that he will obtain a prestigious professional opportunity. Also, for an unmarried young man and his buying a new phone in a dream, when he is of marriageable age, symbolizes a legal connection to a fair girl soon. Interpretation Dream of Ibn Sirin’s new cell phoneIbn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer in a dream buying a new cell phone means that you are acquiring many skills and trying to develop them for the better. In the event that the dreamer sees the new phone in a dream, he will announce the good news that he will receive in the very near future. As for tracking the dreamer’s new and expensive phone, it symbolizes the luxury she is experiencing and achieving the desired goal. If the dreamer sees a broken phone in a dream, and this is not good, he will experience bad days full of disturbing events. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying a new mobile phone This portends her close marriage to a person of good character and she will be happy with him. If a married woman sees in a dream that she hangs up the phone with her husband, this indicates separation and the emergence of various problems. Interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone for a single woman: Seeing a young unmarried girl without discussing it indicates a close marriage. With a good person. If the dreamer sees her communicating with someone and communicating with him in a dream, this will lead to an unhappy marriage and many problems will arise between them. But if someone calls a girl in his dream, this means the presence of an official relationship with a person who has an excellent financial situation and will work to make her happy. The dreamer’s vision of buying a new mobile phone and using it in a dream symbolizes psychological comfort, earning money, and success in her life. I dreamed that my mobile phone was lost and then found it for individuals. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the phone was lost from her, then this indicates the loss of a life partner and separation from him. In the event that the dreamer sees Losing her phone in a dream will lead to financial loss in the coming period. If the girl did not find her phone in the dream, this is a sign of failure in worship and distance from God, and she must

title: Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream. Interpretation of seeing thorns in a dream. What are Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi’s interpretations of seeing thorns in a dream? Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Thorns in a dream. Al-Nabulsi said that the interpretation of a dream about thorns includes many strong connotations, as follows: Thorns in a dream are among the symbols that confirm the increase in pain and sadness in the life of the dreamer. A man who sees that he was hit by thorns in a dream and that he suffered a wound in his hand or feet. The vision shows the pain and injustice that he suffers because of a harmful woman who does not fear God in reality. If the thorns hit one of the limbs of the dreamer’s body and cause him pain in the dream, then the vision shows the hardships and hardships that have passed over the dreamer’s life. He is miserable at work, collects money, and lives with a lot of money. Of difficulties. When the dreamer sees many thorns in a dream, he is mixing with people who are not good because they are unjust, and there is no doubt that he will fall into painful evil because of them. Thorns in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dreamer who sees thorns in a dream means that he is tired in his life because of an evil person who is characterized by ignorance and cruelty, and who Here we mention three partial interpretations of this main interpretation: Whether or not: If an unmarried woman dreams of thorns, she will not find comfort and peace in her life because of the cruelty of her father, brother, or fiancé. Second: When a married woman sees many thorns in a dream, this is a metaphor for her painful life, Full of manifestations of injustice and misery due to her husband’s cruelty to her and his despicable treatment. Third: A divorced woman who sees thorns in a dream means that she suffered a lot in her past life due to her ex-husband’s misbehavior and even now she lives in sadness and anguish because of the bad memories that were instilled in her. she has. Pay attention to her previous marriage. Thorns planted in the dreamer’s hands or in general on his body in a dream are evidence of his debts that tire him in life and make him ashamed of himself and people, and if the dreamer removes these thorns. Then he does not accept humiliation and struggles in his life and acquires money, so he returns the money to the people from whom he borrowed it, thus restoring to him his dignity and the respect of others. Thorns in a single woman’s dreamIbn Shaheen agreed with the jurists in interpreting thorns and said: It indicates unhappiness of all kinds. And if a woman sees anything other than If a married woman dreams that thorns are filling the floor of her house, then this is evidence of the suffering and many problems she suffers from the disintegration of the family, and many disputes with family members. Seeing thorns in an unmarried woman’s dream could be a warning against temptations and sins. And if an unmarried woman sees in a dream a young man A famous person gives her thorns, so he is malicious, and wants harm and misery for her. If an unmarried woman eats a lot of thorns in a dream, then she is disobedient and commits sins every day of her life. The dream is very bad, and the dreamer warns of the wrath of God, and if she wants to protect herself from divine punishment , he must repent soon, ask for forgiveness and seek forgiveness from the Lord of the Worlds. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans and being afraid of them for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing jinn and their fear of a married woman. The existence of jinn is something we cannot deny, as the Holy Qur’an mentioned them and urged us to read some supplications to protect us from them. We find that seeing them in a dream is close to reality, as you discover that the interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans and their fear of a married woman could be a warning against The presence of some harmful events or people around her, so we will understand in detail the opinion of the leading interpreters about this dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing jeans and their fear for a married woman. What is the interpretation of the dream of seeing jeans and fear of them for a married woman? There are many events that a married woman goes through in her life with Her husband, so she may have some dreams that are a warning to her or a guide to what she is feeling at this time. He must read the Qur’an and perform obedience in order to permanently escape from the pain that he feels. The vision can lead to the presence of people who are planning it without knowing it, so the dream proves this deception to her so that she pays attention to them and does not deal with them again. Perhaps the vision indicates the necessity of paying attention. And pay attention to the promises he made earlier, so do not lose sight of them no matter what happens. If you see a lot of jinn talking to her and explaining some things to her, this leads her to her unnatural behavior, which she must put aside and enjoy the good qualities that make her stand out from everyone and please her Lord. Her life and the afterlife. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing the jinn and being afraid of marrying Ibn Sirin? Our greatest imam, Ibn Sirin, clearly explained to us the meaning of seeing the jinn and being afraid of him. The vision shows that she trusts some evil people who do not deserve that trust, and here she is exposed to many problems without knowing the reason. Therefore, she must avoid it and not repeat it, and she must warn everyone. Turn her around so she can live her life unharmed. Her fear of them leads to troubles and sorrows approaching her in the coming period, but with constant remembrance of God and insistence on worship without negligence, there will be no neck and her Lord will save her from every evil that he may find later. Our respected Sheikh Ibn Shirin explained to us that the dream could be a good sign. If she turns into a jinn, because it indicates excellence in the field she is in and that she will be happy with what she is. Reading the Qur’an to the jinn in a dream is a sure sign of her constant closeness to her Lord and her good deeds that serve everyone, so she will find that her life is always calm and stable, free of Familiar differences and concerns in. Zoe. Also, the dream of reciting the Qur’an in jeans indicates her good character, which distinguishes her from anyone else and places her in a wonderful position unparalleled by any other woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about wearing jeans for a married woman? Seeing this dream means that she is living under great pressure that makes her very sad. Permanent, as she may not find solace with her husband, or there are material problems that she cannot get rid of, but she should not be pessimistic, as there is no problem without a solution, so she must be patient until she finds what comforts her heart. The vision may lead her to Taking wrong paths and hiding some important secrets from her husband, she lives in anxiety and

title: Interpretation of a dream about all of one’s teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about all his teeth falling out in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about all his teeth falling out in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to. We will get to know an explanation for it, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, and they are the interpretations of some working scholars and not For those on the site, there is no interference in the interpretations, rather they convey the interpretations of both worlds. Interpretation of a dream about all his teeth falling out in a dream: Teeth falling out in a dream may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer may face in his life during those days. In the event that one sees that His teeth have completely fallen out, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer may go through in those days, and God knows best. If one sees that all of his teeth have fallen out, this may indicate that a relative or acquaintance has completely distanced himself from them. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream It may indicate some disturbances that the dreamer is suffering from during his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about severe hair loss when touched in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that his hair is falling out a lot could indicate a financial loss that the dreamer may suffer during this period. Dreaming of hair falling out when touched in a dream can indicate a loss of effort made by the dreamer to achieve his goals and aspirations. In the event that someone sees his hair falling out when touched, this may be a sign of anxiety that the dreamer is trying to get rid of. Seeing hair falling out when touched Touching it in a dream may indicate unhappy events that the dreamer may be experiencing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about worms falling out of the hair in a dream. Worms falling out of the hair in a dream may mean the sadness that the dreamer is experiencing at that moment, and God knows best. Whoever saw it In a dream that worms were falling out of his head, it may indicate his sadness when he faces the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. If he sees in his dream worms coming out of his head, this may indicate his attempt to achieve goals and ambitions during those days. Whoever dreams of worms coming out of his hair It may indicate the dreamer’s need to achieve his goals and aspirations at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about falling stairs in the house in a dream: Falling down the stairs in the house in a dream may indicate some of the sorrows that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. Anyone who sees in his dream that the stairs It fell in a dream, it could be a sign of sadness while facing the dreamer at that time. In the event that one sees that the stairs have fallen inside the house, this may indicate some problems and crises that the dreamer faced in those days and needs to repent and rely on God. If Descending the stairs in a dream may indicate financial problems that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a toilet falling in a dream A toilet falling in a dream may indicate the fears and sorrows that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. Anyone can dream that If his water cycle has decreased, it could indicate a difficult period that the dreamer is going through

title: Interpretation of a dream about incense for an unmarried and divorced woman according to Ibn Sirin is the most accurate interpretation

preview.html: Among the dreams that confuse the thinking of many people are dreams in which the dreamer sees incense, as incense has different meanings and repercussions, and therefore they seek it. Interpretation of a dream about incense in a dream for single people, for divorced and married women and men, and what is the meaning of seeing incense more than once in a dream, and in this article on the site The encyclopedia will cover all the details related to incense in a dream, from the point of view of experts in dream interpretation and from the point of view of psychologists. Interpretation of a dream about incense in a dream for a single woman. Dreams in which the dreamer sees incense or incense are among the strangest dreams. This is because incense has many different meanings and has connotations. Religious in addition to connotations related to superstition. Since it is known that each sign in a dream has its own interpretation, many people want to know the interpretations related to incense. The science of dream interpretation can be true or false, because it is a science that does not have a clear religious or scientific basis. But it is mainly based on guesswork and linking signs together. Therefore, you should not rely entirely on the interpretation of the dream, and the Muslim is absolutely sure that no one knows the unseen except God Almighty. All fate comes from the owner of the kingdom, and therefore the Muslim should not listen to superstitions. Scholars are interested in The psyche is also known for the science of dream interpretation, as they believe that dreams explain the psychological state and mood of the dreamer and express what is happening in his subconscious mind. Whether it is regret for the past, anxiety about the present, or fear of the future. The interpretation of a dream about incense in a dream for a single woman often indicates the luxury that The dreamer enjoys it. It expresses the calmness that he feels in his daily life. If an unmarried girl sees that incense surrounds her from all sides, this is a good sign, God willing, and it is possible that the dream symbolizes that there is an important positive change that will occur in her life. It could indicate A close marriage and the dreamer’s closeness to an honorable husband protects her from everyone. Interpretation of a dream about an incense burner in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about incense in a dream for a single woman has many different interpretations. Incense often symbolizes goodness, blessing, and living, and therefore if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone He burns it, this indicates, God willing, that the torment you are going through is near. And that he will soon find an important breakthrough, after which he will rearrange life’s priorities. It is possible that the incense will be a good skin for the dreamer, which portends the imminent acquisition of comfort, bliss, tranquility, and security. And if good incense comes from The home of an unmarried woman, this indicates her good reputation among people. Incense is often associated with sustenance, money, abundance, and pleasure. But if the incense does not work in the dream and the dreamer is unable to incense the house, this indicates the presence of many envious and malicious eyes and is evidence of the presence of He wants evil and evil for the dreamer and his family. This dream is considered a warning to the dreamer, to take good care of himself, and not to trust the naivety of everyone around him. And to draw closer to God through good deeds, fasting, and charity, in the hope that worry and distress will disappear.

title: Losing a shoe in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about losing a shoe and finding it for a married woman, and interpretation of a dream about losing a shoe and wearing another shoe for a married woman.

preview.html: Losing one shoe in a dream for a married woman means that she will face more problems in her married or professional life if she is a working woman. There are many interpretations expressed by this vision according to many details mentioned by interpretation scholars, so let us get to know them through the following lines. Losing one shoe in a dream For a married woman: Losing one shoe in a dream For a married woman: If a woman is known for her wealth and belonging to a family with fame and reputation, then there are some tensions that she is exposed to and the family may lose a lot of its status among people or lose its money in illness - they have concluded agreements if they are engaged in trade or entrepreneurship. It is also said that the interpretation of a dream about losing a shoe for a married woman expresses the presence of tension in the marital relationship, especially if the shoe is beautiful and tied with laces, as it indicates a shift from happiness to unhappiness without known reasons. . But if she thinks carefully, she knows the real reason and can adapt to her current situation. Some commentators said that if the shoe was dropped by the seer into the sea water and she was unable to get it out, she might lose one of her children or her husband might be exposed to a chronic disease. The left shoe, its loss expresses Losing someone is very important in a woman's life. It could be a sign of the death of a spouse and the loss of the sense of security that he lived with. As for the right shoe, losing it represents dreams and ambitions that are about to be lost if the woman does not care about them and works hard to achieve them. Losing one shoe in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. When a married woman searches for her shoes and has a firm desire to find them, this is a good sign. She is trying hard to improve her married life and is doing everything in her power to win the heart of her husband. Deviate from it. A little in the past period due to her negligence in performing her duties towards him. If she sees that her husband is the one who lost his shoe, this means that he is married to another woman, and he is not fair between them. However, if she is found wearing one without the other, and is not walking normally, then in reality she is psychologically unstable due to her poor financial conditions and she believes that she deserves the best in life, yet she can help her husband and push him forward. Instead of abandoning him because of his failure beyond his control. An Egyptian website is the largest site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Losing one shoe in a dream for a married pregnant woman. Seeing losing a shoe does not express goodness, rather it means The presence of many problems in the dreamer’s life, and for a pregnant woman whose thoughts focus on the health of her upcoming child, the vision may express danger to the child. The child deserves to be taken care of in the coming period and followed up by a qualified doctor. If a woman searches for a long time for the shoe and finds it in the end, this indicates that her health condition is stable and that the child will be out of danger and the birth will be easy and without suffering (God Almighty). title: I dreamed that a dead person told me that I was going to die

preview.html: Whether this vision has a meaning that brings goodness or not, here is this article from gptafser.com/ to learn more about the interpretation of this vision.Interpretation of a vision in which a dead person tells me that I will die in a dream about a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees a stranger coming to her, she is told She will die in the dream. This vision shows that she will fulfill all her desires in her life. If the unmarried woman sees that the dead person came to her and told her that he died while crying in the dream. The vision showed the end of the problems that were restricting her life, thanks to God Almighty. Or seeing a dead friend, telling her that he died. In the dream of an unmarried girl. The vision indicated that I was hearing the good news, God willing. But if it was thought that he died and no one attended his funeral, then the unmarried woman sleeps. This means that she is doing things that no one in her home will accept. Seeing death in a dream for an unmarried girl It may symbolize the dreamer’s good health and may indicate progress at work or something similar. What if she sees that the dead person addresses her with mysterious words in an unmarried woman’s dream. It is a sign of some unclear events, which occur in the life of the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream The death of a person and crying over him. Interpretation of seeing a dream in which a dead person tells me that I will die in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees a dead person, he tells her that he died in a dream. It indicates the good health enjoyed by the dreamer. What if she saw that an unknown dead person told her that he died in a dream. It indicated The vision indicates the good conditions that the dreamer has. The interpretation of a dream about a familiar dead person tells me that I will die in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of closeness to Almighty God, and perhaps a sign of good reputation. If the deceased comes to give something to a married woman in a dream, this means abundance Sustenance and abundant money, thanks to God Almighty. It can be interpreted as seeing a dead man screaming at a married woman in a dream. There are many problems that she will face in her life, and God knows best. A dream about a dead man may indicate that he is chasing a married woman in a dream. Trying to get close to her is a sign of some diseases. And it may indicate some psychological problems that you face, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Evidence that he will achieve whatever he wants in life from the ambitions that He wants it, God willing. And if a married man sees that a deceased family member tells him that he will die in a dream. This indicates that this person’s debt has been spent and may mean that something will be achieved in the life of the dreamer. Seeing a dead person crying in a man’s dream Married may symbolize the need to send something from the dead to the living. Seeing a dead person smiling could indicate a living person, especially if this dead person is known in the married man’s dream. To alleviate distress and end distress with the grace of Almighty God. Whereas if a married man sees his dead person Talking to him in a dream, this is a sign of love and longing for this person. A dream about a dead person screaming indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about sleep: A dream about sleeping on a bed

preview.html: The meaning of the bed: white, black, clean, dirty, sleeping with an unknown or known person, single, married, pregnant, divorced, and others according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq. The bed indicates everything that a man walks on, and it is for the unmarried wife who sat on it, and for the married man. An obedient and loyal wife if the bed mattress is clean and beautiful, and a tired woman if the bed mattress is dirty and unkempt, and it indicates to the sick person his death, and his bed is broken or rots in a dream, then his affairs will be separated and his goodness will disappear, such as dismissal from work, and dismissal from work. Or separation from the husband, whether through divorce, death, abandonment, or travel. It has been said that if the bed is disorganized, untidy or uncomfortable, then this is a warning of a nearby illness, but if it is white, clean and tidy, it means change at work or at home soon. The Bed If the bed is white and clean, it symbolizes a temporary cessation of worries . If a woman dreams that she is making the bed, this symbolizes a new lover and enjoyable work. If you dream that you are in bed and in a strange room, you will be visited by friends whom you did not expect to visit. If the patient dreams that he is in bed, new complications will arise and the result may be death. If you dream that you are sleeping on a bed outdoors, this foretells that you will encounter pleasant experiences and the opportunity to improve your fortunes. If you dream of negroes passing by your bed, it means that circumstances will arise that will cause anger and interfere with your plans. If you see a friend looking very pale while lying in bed, this symbolizes strange and sad complications that will upset your friends and cause you dissatisfaction. If a mother dreams that her son wets the bed, this foretells that she will face unusual stress and that sick people will not recover as quickly as expected. If people dream that they are urinating the bed, it means that illness or tragedy will coexist with the monotony of their daily work. A bed in a dream for a single woman. A bed in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates marriage and is a symbol of a man, partner, or groom. In an individual dream, a groom whose profession is noble. The bed in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees a bed in her dream or sitting on a bed, this is a sign of a male child if the bed is narrow. As for a wide bed, it is a sign of a female child. The bed in a married woman’s dream. The bed that a married woman sees In her dream, it symbolizes her situation with her husband. It indicates the presence of a problem. A white bed in a dream. A white bed in a dream is a sign of calm and peace of mind for an unmarried woman, as she is a fiancé or a groom, and for a married woman, this indicates her excellent status with her husband. Sitting on a white bed is tranquility and healing, and sleeping on a white bed is happiness and bliss. Sitting in a bed in a dream: As for someone who sees in his dream that he is sitting on a bed, if he is single, he will get married, and if he is married, he will give birth to a male child, in the dream there will be an important discovery. Towards life and its joys. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with a familiar person. If a dream dreams of bitterness

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the army entering a complete dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing an army in a dream is complete from the books of major scholars who interpret dreams and visions. He knows about the army and its entry into reality. This is an important question for every citizen of my country. The army or army in our lives is the foundation of every state and its protection from every attacker and saboteur, and that is why we have collected for you, my dear ones in God, everything related to the vision. Dreaming of calling the army in detail, as well as everything related to the full knowledge of interpretation in a dream to see an army officer. What is the dream of Ibn Sirin’s army? The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that you see the army in a complete dream in its entirety, from visions indicating victory over enemies and protection from every person The dreamer attacks in his life, and the army in a dream is a symbol of goodness. The presence of the army in the army in a complete dream indicates that the dreamer is a person distinguished by intelligence, prudence, and fitness at work, and it also indicates that he has the ability to bear responsibility. The interpretation of the dream about recruitment shows the dreamer that happy and enjoyable events await him, and if he is accepted into the army, then this It indicates the dreamer’s happiness and joy in the coming life. Seeing the army in a dream indicates that the dreamer is in good health, and this is also one of the visions that indicate that the patient is recovering from his illness and entering into a life full of comfort and reassurance, and God knows best. See also: Why does a full officer dream about A dream: Why do you dream of being recruited into the army for poor women? Interpretation of seeing an army officer in a dream full of a woman bowling. Her husband appears close to a strong man who has status and power. This dream can also be evidence of the pride and superiority of the man who loves and wants. To attend a wedding. Why dream of an army carrying an unmarried woman in a dream full of an unknown person? This is evidence of the great girl’s adherence to her customs and traditions and that she does not violate God’s law as people describe her. His wisdom and determination. ...Seeing the army as a whole in an unmarried girl’s dream shows many good things that she will get in the afterlife and shows the fulfillment of her desires and goals that she achieves in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about entering the army for a married woman: To always see a warrior in a dream, complete for a married woman, It refers to her husband, and this is also one of the visions that shows a just and ideal husband and shows her husband’s devotion to her and his intense love. This vision indicates the stability of their married life and the end of disputes and problems. What an army officer dreams about indicates many good things for her and her husband. Why does a man dream of seeing an army? Seeing a warrior in a complete dream for a man is one of the visions that indicate to him the changes that will happen to him in the next life. In addition, Therefore, this person’s idea of ​​becoming an army officer shows that he is a brave and resilient person, and this indicates that the person has advanced in the service and received a lot of money from his profession. Seeing in a dream a complete dreamer who does not accept conscription is one of the visions that indicate that The dreamer is a person who cannot take responsibility and also shows his inability to participate in any disagreements and disputes. God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and

title: Interpretation of the oath in a dream The meaning of the oath and God in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of swearing by God, if the oath is invalid, the correct, the traitor, false testimony, and others, by Ibn Sirin, the unmarried, the married, and the pregnant. Interpretation of swearing in a dream by Ibn Shaheen As for the oath, if it is correct in it, it is victorious and saying the truth, and perhaps it is an increase in worship and love of God Almighty, and if it is false in it, it indicates treachery and humiliation, and it was said about disobedience and poverty for the Almighty’s saying: (And they swear to falsehood while they know, God has prepared for them a severe punishment). He swears for whoever sees in a dream that he swore to a man, then the man deceives him and deceives him. And whoever sees) that he swore truthfully, he is victorious and truthful and kills with his hand and orders in it to please God Almighty and the oath of divorce is deception, and he is on the side of the sultan. If he sees that he swore falsely, he will fail and bear a great sin and regret, and humiliation, arrogance, insignificance and lack of interest in the eyes of men will afflict him. Required, this indicates that you follow the truth and the Sunnah of the Prophet. Oath: If he swears to a man or swears by him, the man deceives him and deceives him, and whoever sees that he swears truly will be victorious. If the oath is invalid, it is poverty, humiliation, betrayal and deception. If the oath is corrupt, it is the destruction of the house of the one who swore it. If the oath is true, it is a just and safe act from fear. In the language, an oath is above all, and giving the wife in a dream is worry and temptation, and what is required by an oath from fathers and mothers, and preferring that to the oath of God Almighty. Interpretation of the oath in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he swears by God, then this vision may indicate that the dreamer's circumstances are for the best and best and that he is an honest person. His recovery is approaching, and if he is hated, he is freed from his worries, and if he is in debt, he will pay his debt. And when a person sees in a dream that he is swearing to God, this vision can indicate the arrival of a lot of goodness, livelihood and money, and this vision also shows that he is getting closer to God Almighty and away from sins, disobedience and taboos, and it also indicates victory over enemies. Interpretation of seeing a vow to God for a person A man who sees in a dream that he swears to God three times and the oath is invalid, this dream can indicate the sins, disobedience and taboos that the dreamer commits in his life, while he sees the two swearing by a simple matter, this is a vision that they are deceived and deceived. And if a person dreams that he swears by other than God, this dream may indicate hypocrisy, deception and arrogance. Interpretation of the oath in a dream for a single woman An unmarried girl who sees a vow in her dream and was honest, this vision may indicate the fulfillment of the desires she wants to achieve as well as indicating her marriage to a righteous man and she will live a happy life with him, while she saw God’s oath, this vision can indicate goodness, livelihood and a lot of money Who comes to her, as success and distinction appear in her life Interpretation of a dream of swearing by God for a married woman A married woman who sees in her dream the oath, this vision may indicate the stability of her marital life with her husband and family, and seeing the two swearing by God three times, but the oath is invalid, this vision may indicate that she is a corrupt and wicked woman

And if a person dreams that he swears by someone other than God, then this dream may indicate hypocrisy, deception, and arrogance. Interpretation of swearing in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees a vow in her dream and it was truthful, this vision may indicate the fulfillment of the desires that She wants to achieve it, and it also indicates that she will marry a good man and she will live a happy life with him. While she saw God’s oath, this vision can indicate goodness, livelihood, and a lot of money that will come to her. It also shows success and distinction in her life.
